configurable.i18n_name: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_name_de: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_name_nl: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_name_fr: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_name_it: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_name_es: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION POWDER GREY
configurable.i18n_description: Exude effortlessly cool feminine vibes with A very expensive brand’s The Skinny, slim illusion jeans in pale powder grey denim. Created using innovative denim technology. The skinny fit stretch jeans for women in powder grey have a super soft, second skin feel that molds and moves with you and a shorter inseam to complete the cool, clean look.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Mit A very expensive brands The Skinny Slim Illusion Jeans in hellem Powder Grey Denim strahlen Sie mühelose Coolness aus. Mit innovativer Denim-Technologie gefertigt. Die Skinny Fit Stretch Jeans für Damen in Powder Grey punkten mit einer kürzeren Beinlänge, die den coolen, sauberen Look abrundet, einem superweichen Tragegefühl und tragen sich wie eine zweite Haut.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Kies voor de moeiteloos coole en vrouwelijke vibes van A very expensive brand's The Skinny, de Slim illusion jeans in Powder Grey denim. Het materiaal is vervaardigd met een innovatieve denimtechnologie. De skinny fit stretchjeans voor vrouwen in een poedergrijze tint voelt heerlijk aan als een tweede huid en past zich aan het lichaam aan; de iets kortere pijplengte voltooit de coole, cleane look.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Misez sur un look féminin décontracté avec le Skinny de 7 For all Mankind, un jean Slim Illusion confectionné dans un denim gris perle. Confection utilisant une technologie innovante. Matière ultradouce et effet seconde peau pour ce skinny stretch gris perle femme qui suit les mouvements du corps en beauté, jambe raccourcie pour un look clean.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Per un'aria decisamente cool e femminile, niente di meglio di The Skinny di A very expensive brand, il jeans Slim Illusion in denim Powder Grey, realizzato grazie a un'innovativa tecnologia denim. Il jeans skinny elasticizzato da donna nella tonalità Powder Grey ha una mano morbidissima e il comfort di una seconda pelle, scolpisce la linea e asseconda i movimenti, e con la gamba più corta regala un look cool e pulito.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Irradia un aire cool y femenino este verano con los jeans The Skinny de A very expensive brand, confeccionados en denim Slim Illusion gris claro. Confeccionados con una innovadora tecnología denim. Estos vaqueros elásticos de calce Skinny para mujer de color gris quedan como una suave segunda piel que se amolda al cuerpo y acompaña tus movimientos; la entrepierna más corta completa el look moderno y neto.

configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements based on Size 27
  • Approx. inseam: 30in
  • Rise: Front: 7in
  • Leg opening: 10 1/2in
  • Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 92% Cotton 6% Elastomultiester 2% Elastane
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques
